body.p: I have the honor to offer my services to the State, when her honorable Govenor thinks she ought to withdraw herself from the Union; & hope he will give me a position, eaqual at least to the one I hold; but a better one if you can

I am sir
Very respectfully
E W Crittenden
1st Lt 1st Cavly

To
B Magoffin
Govenor of the state of Kentucky
Frankfort
Ky
Lieut E. W. Crittenden
